Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.players.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class implements the logic for the players.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String username)

  • Method Details

    • placeCard

      public BoardTile placeCard(PlaceableCard card, int parentRow, int parentCol, CornerPosition corner) throws InvalidActionException
      Implements the logic to place a card regarding its cost and the availability of cards in the hand. For the logic to check if the card is playable in a specific tile see BoardTile.
      Parameters:
      card - represents a PlaceableCard.
      parentRow - the row of the tile on which the card tries to be placed.
      parentCol - the col of the tile on which the card tries to be placed.
      corner - represents the corner on which the card tries to be placed see CornerPosition.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - signals that there aren't enough cards in the hand, card cost is not met, or tile position is not valid.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(PlaceableCard card) throws InvalidActionException
      Adds the card passed as parameter to the hand.
      Parameters:
      card - is a GoldCard or a ResourceCard.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - signals that the hand is full.
      See Also:
      • PlaceableCard

    • getHandCardById

      public PlaceableCard getHandCardById(int id)
      Gets a card from the hand.
      Parameters:
      id - distinctively identifies every card in the deck.
      Returns:
      the selected desired card as a PlaceableCard.

    • setPersonalObjective

      public void setPersonalObjective(ObjectiveCard personalObjective)
      At the beginning the player chooses a personal objective between two cards.
      Parameters:
      personalObjective - the objective chosen by the player

    • setColor

      public void setColor(Color color)
      Setter for the color attribute of the player.
      Parameters:
      color - the color chosen by the player.

    • setStarterCard

      public void setStarterCard(StarterCard starterCard)
      Setter for the starter card attribute of the player.
      Parameters:

    • chooseStarterSide

      public void chooseStarterSide(boolean flipped)
      Chooses the starter side of the starter card.
      Parameters:
      flipped - true if the starter card should be flipped, false otherwise

    • calculateFinalPoints

      public int calculateFinalPoints(List<ObjectiveCard> commonObjectives)
      Calculates the final points of a player summing their current points to the ones obtained with the objective cards (both common objectives and personal objective).
      Parameters:
      commonObjectives - common objectives of the game
      Returns:
      the number of achieved objectives (one objective card is achieved only once)

    • getUsername
